text: the size of the palm of your hand or a deck of cards.   Try to choose lean (low-fat) meats that are also low in phosphorus. If you are a vegetarian, ask about other ways to get your protein.   Low-fat milk is a good source of protein. But milk is high in phosphorus and potassium. And milk adds to your fluid intake. Talk with a dietitian to see if milk fits into your food plan.   I (will) (will not) drink milk. I will drink ______ cup(s) of milk a day.",NIDDK,Kidney Failure: Eat Right to Feel Ri
